verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man אֶחָ֜ד <S%H259><s%> 'e-Chad Now there was a certain מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הָרָמָתַ֛יִם ha-ra-ma-Ta-yim צוֹפִ֖ים <S%H7436><s%> tzo-Fim of Ramathaimzophim מֵהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> me-Har of mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> 'ef-Ra-yim; Ephraim וּשְׁמ֡וֹ <S%H8034><s%> u-she-Mo and his name אֶ֠לְקָנָה <S%H511><s%> 'El-ka-nah [was] Elkanah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son יְרֹחָ֧ם <S%H3395><s%> ye-ro-Cham of Jeroham בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֱלִיה֛וּא <S%H453><s%> 'e-li-Hu of Elihu בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son תֹּ֥חוּ <S%H8459><s%> To-chu of Tohu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son צ֖וּף <S%H6689><s%> tzuf of Zuph אֶפְרָתִֽי׃ <S%H673><s%> 'ef-ra-Ti. an Ephrathite

וְלוֹ֙ ve-Lo שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei And he had two נָשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> na-Shim, wives שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name אַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat of the one חַנָּ֔ה <S%H2584><s%> chan-Nah, [was] Hannah וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit of the other פְּנִנָּ֑ה <S%H6444><s%> pe-nin-Nah; Peninnah וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi had לִפְנִנָּה֙ <S%H6444><s%> lif-nin-Nah and Peninnah יְלָדִ֔ים <S%H3206><s%> ye-la-Dim, had children וּלְחַנָּ֖ה <S%H2584><s%> u-le-chan-Nah but Hannah אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> 'ein had יְלָדִֽים׃ <S%H3206><s%> ye-la-Dim. had no children

וְעָלָה֩ <S%H5927><s%> ve-'a-Lah went up הָאִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ha-'Ish man הַה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hu And this מֵֽעִירוֹ֙ <S%H5892><s%> me-'i-Ro out of his city מִיָּמִ֣ים׀ <S%H3117><s%> mi-ya-Mim yearly יָמִ֔ימָה <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mi-mah, yearly לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֧ת <S%H7812><s%> le-hish-ta-cha-Vot to worship וְלִזְבֹּ֛חַ <S%H2076><s%> ve-liz-Bo-ach and to sacrifice לַיהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts בְּשִׁלֹ֑ה <S%H7887><s%> be-shi-Loh; in Shiloh וְשָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> ve-Sham there שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei And the two בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- sons עֵלִ֗י <S%H5941><s%> 'e-Li, of Eli חָפְנִי֙ <S%H2652><s%> cha-fe-Ni Hophni וּפִ֣נְחָ֔ס <S%H6372><s%> u-Fin-Chas, and Phinehas כֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> ko-ha-Nim the priests לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיְהִ֣י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, And when the time וַיִּזְבַּ֖ח <S%H2076><s%> vai-yiz-Bach offered אֶלְקָנָ֑ה <S%H511><s%> 'el-ka-Nah; was that Elkanah וְנָתַ֞ן <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-Tan he gave לִפְנִנָּ֣ה <S%H6444><s%> lif-nin-Nah to Peninnah אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <S%H802><s%> ish-To, his wife וּֽלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-le-chol- all בָּנֶ֛יהָ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nei-ha and to all her sons וּבְנוֹתֶ֖יהָ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tei-ha and her daughters מָנֽוֹת׃ <S%H4490><s%> ma-Not. portions

וּלְחַנָּ֕ה <S%H2584><s%> u-le-chan-Nah But unto Hannah יִתֵּ֛ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten he gave מָנָ֥ה <S%H4490><s%> ma-Nah portion אַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> 'a-Chat a אַפָּ֑יִם <S%H639><s%> 'ap-Pa-yim; worthy כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חַנָּה֙ <S%H2584><s%> chan-Nah Hannah אָהֵ֔ב <S%H157><s%> 'a-Hev, for he loved וַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh but the LORD סָגַ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> sa-Gar had shut up רַחְמָֽהּ׃ <S%H7358><s%> rach-Mah. her womb

וְכִֽעֲסַ֤תָּה <S%H3707><s%> ve-chi-'a-Sat-tah also provoked צָֽרָתָהּ֙ <S%H6869><s%> tza-ra-Tah And her adversary גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- again כַּ֔עַס <S%H3708><s%> Ka-'as, her sore בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> ba-'a-Vur because of הַרְּעִמָ֑הּ <S%H7481><s%> har-re-'i-Mah; for to make her fret כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- her because סָגַ֥ר <S%H5462><s%> sa-Gar had shut יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh because the LORD בְּעַ֥ד <S%H1157><s%> be-'Ad up רַחְמָֽהּ׃ <S%H7358><s%> rach-Mah. her womb

וְכֵ֨ן <S%H3651><s%> ve-Chen It יַעֲשֶׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> ya-'a-Seh And [as] he did שָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah so year בְשָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> ve-sha-Nah, by year מִדֵּ֤י <S%H1767><s%> mid-Dei when עֲלֹתָהּ֙ <S%H5927><s%> 'a-lo-Tah she went up בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit to the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD כֵּ֖ן <S%H3651><s%> ken after that תַּכְעִסֶ֑נָּה <S%H3707><s%> tach-'i-Sen-nah; so she provoked וַתִּבְכֶּ֖ה <S%H1058><s%> vat-tiv-Keh her therefore she wept וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo not תֹאכַֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> to-Chal. and did not eat

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer Then said לָ֜הּ lah אֶלְקָנָ֣ה <S%H511><s%> 'el-ka-Nah Elkanah אִישָׁ֗הּ <S%H376><s%> 'i-Shah, her husband חַנָּה֙ <S%H2584><s%> chan-Nah to her Hannah לָ֣מֶה <S%H4100><s%> La-meh why תִבְכִּ֗י <S%H1058><s%> tiv-Ki, why weepest וְלָ֙מֶה֙ <S%H4100><s%> ve-La-meh and why לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not תֹֽאכְלִ֔י <S%H398><s%> toch-Li, thou;and why eatest וְלָ֖מֶה <S%H4100><s%> ve-La-meh and why יֵרַ֣ע <S%H3415><s%> ye-Ra' grieved לְבָבֵ֑ךְ <S%H3824><s%> le-va-Vech; thou not;and why is thy heart הֲל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> ha-Lo not אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov ;[am] not I better לָ֔ךְ Lach, מֵעֲשָׂרָ֖ה <S%H6235><s%> me-'a-sa-Rah to thee than ten בָּנִֽים׃ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim. afflicted

וְהִ֖יא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hi She מָ֣רַת <S%H4751><s%> Ma-rat And she [was] in bitterness נָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Na-fesh; of soul וַתִּתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <S%H6419><s%> vat-tit-pal-Lel and prayed עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD וּבָכֹ֥ה <S%H1058><s%> u-va-Choh and wept תִבְכֶּֽה׃ <S%H1058><s%> tiv-Keh. sore

וַתִּדֹּ֨ר <S%H5087><s%> vat-tid-Dor And she vowed נֶ֜דֶר <S%H5088><s%> Ne-der a vow וַתֹּאמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> vat-to-Mar, and said יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot of hosts אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if רָאֹ֥ה <S%H7200><s%> ra-'Oh if thou wilt indeed תִרְאֶ֣ה׀ <S%H7200><s%> tir-'Eh look בָּעֳנִ֣י <S%H6040><s%> bo-'o-Ni on the affliction אֲמָתֶ֗ךָ <S%H519><s%> 'a-ma-Te-cha, of thine handmaid וּזְכַרְתַּ֙נִי֙ <S%H2142><s%> u-ze-char-Ta-ni and remember וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- shall never תִשְׁכַּ֣ח <S%H7911><s%> tish-Kach me and not forget אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <S%H519><s%> 'a-ma-Te-cha, thine handmaid וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> ve-na-tat-Tah but wilt give לַאֲמָתְךָ֖ <S%H519><s%> la-'a-ma-te-Cha unto thine handmaid זֶ֣רַע <S%H2233><s%> Ze-ra' child אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim; then וּנְתַתִּ֤יו <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Tiv then I will give לַֽיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh him unto the LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> ye-Mei all the days חַיָּ֔יו <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yav, of his life וּמוֹרָ֖ה <S%H4177><s%> u-mo-Rah and there shall no razor לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- shall never יַעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> ya-'a-Leh come עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho. upon his head
